title: Why is lion dancing so noisy? - Quora

response.answer_text: we celebrate every traditional events noisily.There are tow fundamental elements that exist in every traditional celebrating: red and noisy. Red is color of blood. By blood we mean blood inside of human bodies, and hence it means life. Noisiness threaten away the devils. This tradition has been with Chinese ever since there were Chinese.

One legend has it that lion dance was performed to chased away the mythical beast, "Nian", who was eating crops from the farmers. To chase him away, the Chinese devised this lion dance, which consists of loud musical instruments and a fierce creature. "Nian" eventually got chased away and lion dance has since been used for celebrations. Hence, lion dance has always been performed in celebratory events and has always successfully draw crowds in the area due to its loud musical instruments.  Source:SGHeQuan.com - Singapore Lion Dance Troupe est. 1993.
